name: Clockwork Relay
description:
Lead a band of wind-up toys through 28 challenging levels by strategically rewinding your tired allies. Be careful; energy is at a premium, and the tiny plastic cogs inside your troops can only store so much. Every bit counts!

(Almost) Every level gives you exactly enough energy to reach the intended solution. If you find any unintended solutions, please comment! I'd love to hear about them!

(Solutions video coming soon!!!)

Made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2
